dayofweek.description: Day of the week football match took place

comp.description: Competition the match was played in (e.g. Premier League)

venue.description: Venue of the match relative to the goalkeeper's team

team.description: Team the goalkeeper represented in the match

game_started.description: Flag indicating whether the goalkeeper started the match

minutes.description: Number of minutes goalkeeper played for

gk_shots_on_target_against.description: Number of shots on target faced by the goalkeeper

gk_goals_against.description: Number of goals conceded by the goalkeeper

gk_saves.description: Number of saves made by the goalkeeper

gk_save_pct.description: Save percentage for the goalkeeper for the match

gk_clean_sheets.description: Flag to indicate whether goalkeeper kept a clean sheet

gk_pens_att.description: Penalty kicks faced by the goalkeeper

gk_pens_saved.description: Penalty kicks saved by the goalkeeper

gk_pens_missed.description: Penalty kicks missed by the opponent

gk_passes_launched.description: Number of passes launched over 40 yards

gk_passes_pct_launched.description: Pass completion % for passed more than 40 yards

gk_passes.description: Total passes attempted excluding goal kicks

gk_passes_throws.description: Number of throws attempted by the goalkeeper

gk_pct_passes_launched.description: Pct. of passes launched (> 40 yds) excluding goal kicks

gk_passes_length_avg.description: Average length of passes in yards excluding goal kicks

gk_pct_goal_kicks_launched.description: Pct. of goal kicks that were launched (> 40 yds)

gk_goal_kick_length_avg.description: Average length of goal kicks in yards

gk_crosses.description: Number of opposition crosses into the penalty area

gk_crosses_stopped.description: Number of opposition crosses successfully stopped

gk_crosses_stopped_pct.description: Pct. of crosses into penalty area successfully stopped

gk_def_actions_outside_pen_area.description: Number of defensive actions outside the penalty area

gk_avg_distance_def_actions.description: Average distance from goal (yards) of defensive actions

match_report.description: Hyperlink to match report (quirk from ingestion step)

stg_matchlogs__parsed.description: Cleaned and parsed match-level goalkeeper data derived from matchlogs

competition.description: Competition the match was played in (e.g. Premier League)

venue.description: Venue of the match relative to the goalkeeper's team

team.description: Team the goalkeeper represented in the match

game_started.description: Flag indicating whether the goalkeeper started the match

minutes_played.description: Number of minutes played by the goalkeeper in the match

gk_shots_on_target_against.description: Number of shots on target faced by the goalkeeper

gk_goals_against.description: Number of goals conceded by the goalkeeper

gk_saves.description: Number of saves made by the goalkeeper

gk_clean_sheets.description: Indicator of whether the goalkeeper kept a clean sheet

gk_pens_att.description: Penalty kicks faced by the goalkeeper

gk_pens_saved.description: Penalty kicks saved by the goalkeeper

gk_pens_missed.description: Penalty kicks missed by the opponent

gk_passes_launched.description: Number of passes launched over 40 yards

gk_passes.description: Total passes attempted excluding goal kicks

gk_passes_throws.description: Number of throws attempted by the goalkeeper

gk_passes_length_avg.description: Avgerage length of passes (yards), excl. goal kicks

gk_goal_kicks_launched.description: Number of goal kicks launched over 40 yards

gk_crosses.description: Number of opposition crosses into the penalty area

gk_crosses_stopped.description: Number of opposition crosses successfully stopped

gk_def_actions_outside_pen_area.description: Number of defensive actions outside the penalty area

gk_avg_distance_def_actions.description: Average distance from goal (yards) of defensive actions

fct_goalkeeper_performance.description: Aggregated goalkeeper performance over all EPL matches.

matches_played.label: Matches Played
matches_played.description: Number of Premier League matches in which the goalkeeper played at least one minute for the given team.

clean_sheets.label: Clean Sheets
clean_sheets.description: Total number of clean sheets kept by the goalkeeper.

ga.label: Goals Against
ga.description: Total number of goals conceded by the goalkeeper

saves.label: Saves
saves.description: Total number of saves made by the goalkeeper

shots_on_target_against.label: Shots on Target Against
shots_on_target_against.description: Total number of shots on target faced by the goalkeeper

save_pct.label: Save %
save_pct.description: Save percentage calculated as total saves divided by shots on target faced, expressed as a percentage.

psxg_minus_ga.label: PSxG − GA
psxg_minus_ga.description: Difference between post-shot expected goals conceded (PSxG) and actual goals conceded. Positive values indicate goals prevented relative to shot quality faced.

crosses_faced_p90.label: Crosses Faced (per 90)
crosses_faced_p90.description: Average number of opposition crosses faced per 90 minutes played, calculated from total crosses divided by minutes played.

crosses_stopped_pct.label: Crosses Stopped %
crosses_stopped_pct.description: Percentage of opposition crosses into the penalty area that were successfully stopped by the goalkeeper.

pass_att_p90.label: Pass Attempts (per 90)
pass_att_p90.description: Average number of passes attempted per 90 minutes played, excluding goal kicks.

long_kick_pass_completion_pct.label: Long Kick Pass Completion %
long_kick_pass_completion_pct.description: Completion percentage for launched passes over 40 yards, calculated from completed versus attempted launched passes.

def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.label: Def. Actions OPA (per 90)
def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.description: Average number of defensive actions taken outside the penalty area per 90 minutes played, representing sweeping activity.

avg_distance_def_actions.label: Avg. Distance of Def. Actions
avg_distance_def_actions.description: Average distance from goal (in yards) of defensive actions taken outside the penalty area.

mart_goalkeeper_league_ratings.description: Goalkeeper performance relative to other goalkeepers in the EPL.

save_pct.label: Save %
save_pct.description: Save percentage calculated as total saves divided by shots on target faced, expressed as a percentage.

psxg_minus_ga.label: PSxG − GA
psxg_minus_ga.description: Difference between post-shot expected goals conceded (PSxG) and actual goals conceded. Positive values indicate goals prevented relative to shot quality faced.

crosses_stopped_pct.label: Crosses Stopped %
crosses_stopped_pct.description: Percentage of opposition crosses into the penalty area that were successfully stopped by the goalkeeper.

pass_att_p90.label: Pass Attempts (per 90)
pass_att_p90.description: Average number of passes attempted per 90 minutes played, excluding goal kicks.

long_kick_pass_completion_pct.label: Long Kick Pass Completion %
long_kick_pass_completion_pct.description: Completion percentage for launched passes over 40 yards, calculated from completed versus attempted launched passes.

def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.label: Def. Actions OPA (per 90)
def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.description: Average number of defensive actions taken outside the penalty area per 90 minutes played, representing sweeping activity.

z_save_pct.label: Z: Save %
z_save_pct.description: Save percentage Z-score relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League (higher values correspond to better shot-stopping performance).

z_psxg_minus_ga.label: Z: PSxG − GA
z_psxg_minus_ga.description: 'PSxG - GA' Z-score relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League (higher values correspond to better shot-stopping performance).

z_crosses_stopped_pct.label: Z: Crosses Stopped %
z_crosses_stopped_pct.description: Crosses stopped percentage Z-score relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League (higher values correspond to better crossing performance).

z_pass_att_p90.label: Z: Pass Attempts (per 90)
z_pass_att_p90.description: Average passes attempted per-90 Z-score relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League (higher values correspond to better passing performance).

z_long_kick_pass_completion_pct.label: Z: Long Kick Pass Completion %
z_long_kick_pass_completion_pct.description: Long kick pass completion percentage Z-score relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League (higher values correspond to better passing performance).

z_def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.label: Z: Def. Actions OPA (per 90)
z_def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.description: Average defensive actions OPA per-90 Z-score relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League (higher values correspond to better sweeping performance).

pct_save_pct.label: Pctile: Save %
pct_save_pct.description: Save percentage performance percentile relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League.

pct_psxg_minus_ga.label: Pctile: PSxG − GA
pct_psxg_minus_ga.description: 'PSxG - GA' performance percentile relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League.

pct_crosses_stopped_pct.label: Pctile: Crosses Stopped %
pct_crosses_stopped_pct.description: Crosses stopped percentage performance percentile relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League.

pct_pass_att_p90.label: Pctile: Pass Attempts (per 90)
pct_pass_att_p90.description: Average passes attempted per-90 performance percentile relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League.

pct_long_kick_pass_completion_pct.label: Pctile: Long Kick Pass Completion %
pct_long_kick_pass_completion_pct.description: Long kick pass completion percentage performance percentile relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League.

pct_def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.label: Pctile: Def. Actions OPA (per 90)
pct_def_actions_outside_pen_area_p90.description: Average defensive actions OPA per-90 performacne percentile relative to other goalkeepers in the English Premier League.

overall_score.label: Overall Score
overall_score.description: Overall performance as a weighted sum of league-standardised metrics, with approximately 45% emphasis on shot-stopping outcomes, 20% on box command (i.e crossing), 20% on distribution and 15% on sweeping.

overall_rank.label: Overall Rank
overall_rank.description: Rank English Premier League goalkeepers based on the overall performance metric (i.e. 'overall_score').
